body.p: offers access to some helpful AI-related features, including the AI Assistant chatbot and the AI-enhanced Search Summary component. The AI Assistant chatbot is a component that can be integrated into your WebHelp output to allow your users to have real-time conversations with the AI Assistant, helping them find more accurate answers and information. The AI-Enhanced Search Summary component displays AI-generated search results before the usual results, ensuring that your users have easy access to the most cutting-edge type of AI-generated results.
